dataset.oovToken: OOV token for the data -> string
dataset.paddingToken: Padding token for the data -> string
dataset.paddingMode: Mode of padding (pre or post) -> string
dataset.shuffleFlag: Shuffle flag for the dataset loader -> bool
dataset.numWorkers: Number of workers for the dataloader -> int

model.encoderFeedForwardUnits: Feed forward units in encoder -> int
model.dropoutValue: Dropout value for the model -> float
model.activationFunction: Activation function for the model -> string
model.titleSequenceSize: Max sequence length for title -> int
model.contentSequenceSize: Max sequence length for content -> int
model.embeddingFlag: Boolean value to determine the embedding layer type -> bool
model.titleEmbeddingMatrixPath: Embedding matrix path for title if embeddingFlag is True -> string
model.contentEmbeddingMatrixPath: Embedding matrix path for content if embeddingFlag is True -> string
model.convOutputUnits: Output channel size of the conv layer in decoder -> int
model.hiddenUnits1: First hidden unit in the decoder layer -> int
model.hiddenUnits2: Second hidden unit in the decoder layer -> int
model.hiddenUnits3: Third hidden unit in the decoder layer -> int

evaluate.checkpointPath: Checkpoint path for evaluating the test set -> string
evaluate.reportPath: Metrics path to save the model metrics -> string
